--00163630f7733ae6f50486eb140b
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

Hi guys

I've been trolling for a few weeks :-) I work on the WCF team at Microsoft.
We're currently in the very early stages of planning for new apis for
supporting pure REST and HTTP style development. Our goal is to create
something simple, lightweight and true to form. We are looking provide a
natural API both for the service author and for the consumer. This not an
attempt to simply retrofit onto a SOAP based model.

It would be great to hear thoughts you guys have on what would be the ideal
developer experience for using REST. Also if you'd like to be involved we'd
welcome the feedback.

Regards
Glenn

--00163630f7733ae6f50486eb140b
